name: api_math_Vector4

properties.name: magnitude
properties.description: Returns the length of this vector (Read Only).

properties.name: normalized
properties.description: Returns a normalized vector based on the current vector. The normalized vector has a magnitude of 1

properties.name: sqrMagnitude
properties.description: Returns the squared length of this vector (Read Only).

properties.name: w
properties.description: W component of the vector.

properties.name: x
properties.description: X component of the vector.

properties.name: y
properties.description: Y component of the vector.

properties.name: z
properties.description: Z component of the vector.

properties.name: Equals
properties.description: Returns true if the given vector is exactly equal to this vector.

properties.name: Set
properties.description: Set x, y, z and w components of an existing Vector4.

properties.name: ToString
properties.description: Returns a formatted string for this vector.

properties.name: Distance
properties.description: Returns the distance between a and b.

properties.name: Dot
properties.description: Dot Product of two vectors.

properties.name: Lerp
properties.description: Linearly interpolates between two vectors.

properties.name: LerpUnclamped
properties.description: Linearly interpolates between two vectors.

properties.name: Max
properties.description: Returns a vector that is made from the largest components of two vectors.

properties.name: Min
properties.description: Returns a vector that is made from the smallest components of two vectors.

properties.name: MoveTowards
properties.description: Moves a point current towards target.

properties.name: Normalize
properties.description: Makes this vector have a magnitude of 1.

properties.name: Project
properties.description: Projects a vector onto another vector.

properties.name: Scale
properties.description: Multiplies two vectors component-wise.
